alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 15 at 8:44PM EST until November 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Florida, including the following area, Upper Keys in Monroe County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall is expected at times today through tonight. Storm totals of 5-8 inches with locally higher amounts in excess of 10 inches is possible. High rainfall rates along with repeated bouts of rainfall may result in flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
